amendatorysection.para: District No. 24 shall contain the counties of York and Seward and that part of Polk County beginning at the intersection of the Polk-Butler County line and County Road 36, west on County Road 36 and continuing west along east-west lines extending west from County Road 36 to County Road Q, south on County Road Q to County Road 32, west on County Road 32 to County Road J, south on County Road J to County Road 28, west on County Road 28 to County Road H, south on County Road H to the Polk-York County line, east along the Polk-York County line to the Polk-Butler County line, and north along the Polk-Butler County line to the point of beginning.
